name: Geography Picture Quiz
description:
This project was presented as the final project for conclusion of educational program "INKUBATOR - PISMO"  for "Unity/C# game developer".
Special thanks to our smart and handsome mentor, mr.  Dominik Cvetkovski.

Geography picture quiz is a quiz game with pictures of 140 famous places around the world. From ancient Egypt, Rome and Athens to modern wonders of the world.

The game will get more levels in upcoming weeks.

This is the first game created by Doctor Bob.
A lot of games to come in the future, stay tuned.
